oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Efficacy of Topical Treatment with Lincomycin HCl for Papillomatous Digital Dermatitis: Gross and Histological Evaluation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Berry, S. L.
Read, D. H.
Walker, R. L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: papillomatous digital dermatitis
PDD
Terramycin-343速
Lincomix速
lesions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Twenty-five cows were allotted to 3 groups : 1) treated with 10 g Lincomix速 Soluble Powder (n=11), 2) treated with Terramycin-343速 Soluble Powder (n=11), or 3) no treatment (n=3). Cows were placed on a hydraulic tilt-table at enrollment (d 1) and feet were examined. Cows with papillomatous digital dermatitis (PDD) on one or both rear feet were enrolled in the study.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1998; 288
